Package model.players

Class Goalkeeper

java.lang.Object
model.players.GamePlayer
model.players.Goalkeeper
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<GamePlayer>
public class Goalkeeper
extends GamePlayer
The Goalkeeper class represents a GamePlayer that is a goalkeeper.

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from class model.players.GamePlayer

    playerName, playerStatistics

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Goalkeeper​(java.lang.String name, java.awt.Color color)
    Creates a Goalkeeper with a specified name and color.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void grabsBall()
    Makes the goalkeeper grab the ball if the ball is in range or out for a goal kick Sets the ball in possession of the goalkeeper
    void moveDown()
    Moves the goalkeeper by 5 in the +y direction
    void moveLeft()
    Moves the goalkeeper by int movementStep} in the -x direction
    void moveRandomly()
    Moves the goalkeeper randomly within the goal frame
    void moveRight()
    Moves the goalkeeper by int movementStep} in the +x direction
    void moveUp()
    Moves the goalkeeper by 5 in the -y direction
    void setInitialPosition()
    Sets the initial position of the goalkeeper to (280, 70)
    void shootBall()
    Makes the goalkeeper shoot the ball by moving the SoccerBall After shooting the ball the player is no longer in possession of the ball
    java.lang.String toString()
    Returns the statistics of the goalkeeper
